#text=It was Saturday night so it was time for me to take my weekly bath .
#text=I turned on the hot water and waited for the water coming out of the tap to get warm .
#text=When it did , I closed the stopper and waited for the bath to fill .
#text=While it was doing so , I took some bath salts from the shelf and added them to the water .
#text=When the bath was full , I lit a candle and then took off my clothes and got in the water .
#text=I closed my eyes and soaked for a while , feeling the hot water relax my sore muscles .
#text=After a few minutes I grabbed a bar of soap and a washcloth and scrubbed my body , taking off the dirt and dead skin .
#text=Then I soaked some more , almost falling asleep .
#text=Finally , it was time to get out so I let out the water , grabbed a towel and dried off .
